description:
1 - Silver Birch - Cut back from buildings x 1.5m.
2 - Silver Birch - Cut back from building x 1.5m. and clear from cable
3 - Silver Birch - C;ear off wall. Lift by 1m.
4 - Silver Birch - Clear back from building by 1m.Lift to 5m
5 - Silver Birch - No action 
6 - Norway Maple - Cut back dead wood.
7 - Norway Maple - Clear from building to 1m and clear from cable
8 - Cherry - Reduce by 20% /  Lift  to 6m.above road
10 - London - Plane - No action
11 - Crab Apple - No action
12 - Crab Apple - Crown Thin  by 30%. - remove nosing branches
13 - Holly - Cut down - poison root.
14 - Prunus - ( 46 Barnsbury St.)  - 15% Crown Thin
15 - Silver Birch - Clear building by 0.5m. Lift to 3m.
16 - Cherry - Crown reduced back to previous points
18 - White Beam - Clear building by 1.5m. /  Crown thin 20%
19 - Silver Birch - Clear building by 1m. - 1.5m.
20 - Lime - Lift to 4m. / 40% Crown Thin
21 - Norway Maple - Lift to 4m. / Crown reduced back to previous points
22 - Oak - Cut back dead wood - climbing inspection 
23 - Silver Birch - ( 48 Barnsbury St. ) - Crown lift to 6m. 
24 - Sycamore x 2 - Crown reduction 30%
25 - Sycamore - Crown reduction x 30%
26 - Sycamore - Crown Lift x 5m.
27 - Sycamore Crown Lift x 5m.
28 - Sycamore - Reduce by 30% and monitor
31 - Sycamore - Reduce lateral spread by 30%
32 - Acacia - Crown reduction 30%
33 - Hornbeam - ( 60 Barnsbury St.) - Clear ivy  for inspection.
34 - Rowen - ( 60 Barns St.) - clear deadwood / clear wall x 1.5m.
35 - Lime - Clear road x 6m. / clear fence x 1.5m.
36 - Lime Crown reduction 25% / Clear from light  x 2m.
37 Sycamore - Clear off games area / Crown reduction 30%
38 - Lime - Crown Lift x 5m.
42 - Ash - Fell & poison
44 - Rowen - No action
46 - Rowen - Clear Building x 1.5m.
47 - Rowen - Clear wall x 1m.
48 - Silver Birch - Clear Building x .0.5m. / Crown Lift x 3m.
49 - Rowen - No action
50 - Holly - Clear buildin
